ModMetaData.name: Psycast Gene Spawner fork
ModMetaData.author: zenlor
ModMetaData.description:
Add Random chanches for pawns to receive psycast genes.
Every pawn has a certain random chance to mutate and contract a new psycast gene on creation.
Pawn Xenotypes are categorized by nature:
Natural pawns: - Baseliners - Neanderthal - Impid - Yattakin - VRE Phytokin: Garunleankin, Animakin, Poluxkin - VRE Lycanthrope: Lycan, Wolfman - VRE Pigskins: Pigskin, Boarskin
Aggressive pawns: - Hussar (only if they are not Psychically Dull or Deaf) - Waster - Wolfman (VRE) - Boarskin (VRE)
Noble pawns: - Hussar - Highmate - Lowmate - Sanguophage - Sanguophage - Strigoi - Sanguophage - Ekkimian - Sanguophage - Bruxa
When a new pawn is created this mod will bestow a new psycast level in a random available psycast path and a base ability.
The Vanilla Psycast Expanded option "Chance ...xxx second FIXME" have a chance to bestow up to 9 psycast levels.
The base psycast level is 2: one point to open a random path and another for a random level 1 ability.
Added gene support for paths: - VPE - Ranger - Edge of descension - Stuncaster 3.0
NOTE: This mod has a mild incompatability with mods that add new genes or psycast paths.
